QuestionText: When, in the calendar year, does the Annual Lagoon Permit become 50% off retail price?
What must a patron do, in order to recieve a permit, if their registration expires after the start date?
Answer1: Renew their registration to cover the rest of the calendar year
Answer2: Nothing. Their permit is good for the calendar year regardless of registration date.

QuestionText: In order to obtain a valid lagoon permit for a vessel registered in a different state, the owner must first visit the DMV to fill out the required documentation then recieve a temp permit from the City of Carlsbad - which expires in 60 days.

Answer1: Power is any vessel that has a motor whereas Passive is the opposite
Answer2: Power is any vessel without a motor whereas Passive is the opposite
Answer4: Power is a boat whereas Passive is a PWC (personal watercraft)

QuestionText: Once a patron purchases their first set of permits, they may only purchase one additional later in the year.
Answer1: True. Permits are counted as memberships.
Answer2: True. Permits are counted as memberships. If a client wishes to purhcase more, the permit will be associated with a different CarlsbadConnect account.
Answer3: False. Permits are counted as memberships. Patrons can only purchase one set per calendar year.
Answer4: False.A client may purchase as many permits as they wish
